subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dave Bolland returned to the Chicago lineup after missing 17 games with a concussion and had a goal and three assists as the Blackhawks avoided being swept by the Vancouver Canucks.
snippet: Dave Bolland returned to the Chicago lineup after missing 17 games with a concussion and had a goal and three assists as the Blackhawks avoided being swept by the Vancouver Canucks.
